description: multicolored wrap style skirt with fringe along one side; three bands of pattern, top and bottom, approximately 4\" wide, center band approximately 16-1/4\" wide; bands separated with bands of brown approximately 2-1/2\" wide; top, bottom and top and bottom of center sections have multicolored horizontal stripes; wide center band has large diamonds, triangles and cup-like motifs in multicolors
title: Skirt
